TopicTitle: Post all your unused planet textures and planet making tips here!

Articles.Content:
As most Kopernicus mod developers know, it is hard to produce planet textures from scratch.

This means that we usually spend most of our time roaming around in Space Engine for textures, but not many are really stock-a-like.

So if you have any textures you have either created or found and haven't used/think about using, then please do post them here.

However, if you found the textures on the internet, then please do give credit to their respective owner and please place a link to their art page/texture page.

The problem with internet textures is the lack of height maps for the planet texture.

If you have any tips for developing planets using Kopernicus please post them here.

Remember, this is just for the ease of Kopernicus mod developers like myself, amarius1, Mr.HappyFace, Thomas P., Hammersamatom, \_Augustus\_, JebKeb, and many, many more, now and future.

If you guys want to make textures and heightmaps, it's totally fine with us, and we will try our greatest to credit you for the texturing work.
